ðŸ“– Summary: PrivTracker is a tool for generating private BitTorrent trackers, enabling users to share files exclusively within a defined group. It simplifies the process of creating a private tracker, offering features like automatic TLS/HTTPS support and Docker Compose integration. This allows for secure and efficient file sharing without relying on public trackers or centralized services.
